name: Beautiful Bloom 1
description: A stunning arrangement of fresh red roses and white lilies, perfect for romantic occasions.
fullDescription: This exquisite arrangement combines the timeless elegance of red roses with the delicate beauty of white lilies. Each stem is hand-selected and arranged by our expert florists to create a stunning centerpiece that will brighten any room.
details: Hand-arranged with premium quality stems, guaranteed fresh for 7+ days

name: Beautiful Bloom 2
description: Vibrant sunflower and daisy mix that brings joy and brightness.
fullDescription: Bring sunshine into someone's day with this cheerful combination of sunflowers and daisies. This arrangement radiates happiness and positivity, making it perfect for celebrations and special moments.
details: Cheerful and long-lasting, perfect for any occasion

name: Beautiful Bloom 3
description: Elegant purple orchids with complementary purple accents.
fullDescription: Experience luxury with these stunning purple orchids. A symbol of elegance and sophistication, this arrangement is perfect for those who appreciate the finer things in life.
details: Luxurious and sophisticated, perfect for special celebrations

name: Beautiful Bloom 4
description: Pastel tulip collection in soft spring colors.
fullDescription: Welcome the spring season with our beautiful pastel tulips. These soft-colored blooms create a gentle, romantic atmosphere perfect for any space.
details: Perfect for spring celebrations and fresh home decor

name: Beautiful Bloom 5
description: Premium rose collection in multiple shades.
fullDescription: Our premium rose collection features the most beautiful blooms available. Each rose is carefully selected for its color intensity and petal quality.

name: Beautiful Bloom 6
description: Tropical mix of exotic flowers from around the world.
fullDescription: Escape to a tropical paradise with this exotic flower arrangement. Featuring rare blooms from around the globe, this arrangement is truly one-of-a-kind.
